text: The Netherlands has 342 municipalities in 12 provinces in Europe and 3 special municipalities (public bodies) in the Caribbean, the Caribbean Netherlands. Together 345 municipalities since 2023. == Special municipalities in the Caribbean == Island Island group Bonaire Leeward Antilles Saba Leeward Islands Sint Eustatius Leeward Islands == Municipalities
